        public void testLOCALAttachmentPointLearning()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This test verifies that the learning behavior on OFPP_LOCAL ports. Once a host is learned on OFPP_LOCAL, it is allowed to move only from one OFPP_LOCAL to another OFPP_LOCAL port.
